CustomField.formula: IF (TEXT(Payment_Type__c) == 'Visa / Master / JCB', IF (Beneficial_Owner__c, 'Change Payment - Beneficial Owner Form', ''), IF (TEXT(Payment_Type__c) == 'Private', IF (Beneficial_Owner__c, 'Change Payment - SKDKK and Beneficial Owner Form', 'Change Payment - SKDKK Form'), IF (TEXT(Payment_Type__c) == 'Saving Account', IF (Beneficial_Owner__c, 'Change Payment - SKDR and Beneficial Owner Form', 'Change Payment - SKDR Form'),null)))
CustomField.label: Email Subject
